plot: Debu, a struggling songwriter, has been dumped by his lover and left out on the streets. Juhi, an aging streetwalker, finds it difficult to pick up customers. Kaku, her twelve years old son...
title: Do Paise Ki Dhoop, Chaar Aane Ki Baarish
